Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.phd

This package contains classes for working with Consed Phd files.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Phd
    Phd is an object representation of a single read from a phd file or a phd.ball file.
    PhdBallParser
    PhdBallParser is an interface that will parse a phd formatted structures and call the appropriate visit methods on the given PhdBallVisitor.
    PhdBallVisitor
    PhdBallVisitor is a visitor for a phd.ball file or phd file that contains one or more phd records.
    PhdBallVisitorCallback  
    PhdBallVisitorCallback.PhdBallVisitorMemento
    PhdBallVisitorMemento is a marker interface that PhdBallFileParser instances can use to "rewind" back to the position in its ace file in order to revisit portions of the ace file.
    PhdDataStore  
    PhdReadTag
    PhdReadTag is specially formatted optional additional information about a particular range of bases of a phd record.
    PhdReadTagVisitor
    PhdReadTagVisitor is a Visitor that will visit a single PhdReadTag.
    PhdVisitor  
    PhdWholeReadItem
    PhdWholeReadItem is specially formatted optional additional information about an entire phd record.
    PhdWholeReadItemVisitor  
    PhdWriter
    PhdWriter is an interface for writing Phds.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPhdBallVisitor
    AbstractPhdBallVisitor is a PhdBallVisitor that implements all the methods with default implementations that don't do anything.
    AbstractPhdReadTagVisitor
    A PhdReadTagVisitor that collects the information about a single read tag and then calls the protected method visitPhdReadTag() when the entire tag has been visited (this is known because AbstractPhdReadTagVisitor.visitEnd() as been called).
    AbstractPhdVisitor
    AbstractPhdVisitor is an abstract implementation of PhdVisitor that collects all the information about a single phd record.
    PhdBallFileParser
    PhdBallFileParser can parse phd.ball files and individual phd files.
    PhdBallWriter  
    PhdBuilder
    PhdBuilder is a Builder that will create a Phd object using the given values.
    PhdDirDataStore  
    PhdFileDataStoreBuilder  
    PhdUtil
    PhdUtil is a Utility class for Phred Phd data.
    SinglePhdWriter
    SinglePhdWriter is a PhdWriter that only allows one Phd to be written out.
    TraceDirPhdDataStoreBuilder
    Class that can make a PhdDataStore from a folder of trace files (ab1, ztr, scf etc).

Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.phd Description

This package contains classes for working with Consed Phd files.
